title: [1.3-1.7.10][搬运][ssp/smp]凝聚成块 Condensed Block Mod Reborn(缩小背包空间)
author: lxq54sb123
txt_content:
本帖最后由 C似水流年 于 2015-8-14 19:26 编辑 

--前言--
  

你是否总是觉得背包空间不够？是否不够却又不想作家，想继续游荡？是否觉得压缩过的东西（西瓜，铁块，金块，钻石快....）也不够？？
这个mod能够帮助你！！

--疯狂计算--
原文：
9x Stone = 1x Condensed Stone
9x Condensed Stone = 1x Super Condensed Stone
9x Super Condensed Stone = 1x Extreme Condensed Stone
Extreme Condensed Stone is stackable to 64.
9*9*9*64 = 46 656 in one Slot!

A double chest filled with Extreme condensed stone:
6 Rows with 9 Slots and 64 Extreme Condensed Stone
6*9*46656 = 2 519 424 Stones!!!

Condensing Sugarcane:
All condensed Items have an extra step. The Block Step!
9*9*9*64 = 419904 in one Slot!!!

6 Rows with 9 Slots and 64 Extreme Condensed Sugarcane
6*9*419904 = 22 674 816 Sugarcane!!!
翻译：
9x的石头= 1X的浓缩9x的石头超浓缩= 1X超级超级浓缩9x的超浓缩浓缩的石头= 1X的极端石头极端浓缩到64。9×9×9×6446。6×9＝2×46656 519 424石头！！！也就是说可以吧519424个石头变成一个方块！！！
--图片展示--







--下载地址--

感谢d24002的汉化
[1.7.1]Mirror http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=3850525881&uk=2637604569提取码27o4



完
你的回复就是我的动力
荆轲刺秦王
我们下次再见
